snippet.title: Children of Morta - announcement gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Children of Morta on Steam: http://bit.ly/ChildrenOfMortaOnSteam
Official website: http://childrenofmorta.com/

IT RUNS IN THE FAMILY.

The Bergson family has watched over Mount Morta for generations as the guardians of the mystical mountain. They now face their most dangerous trial as a family. Corruption has spread, morphing the once peaceful mountain into a violent and monster infested nightmare. Experience what it means to be in a family of heroes. Take part in their journey, their struggles, and their victories!

---

Become part of the family! Follow us here:
Children of Morta Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ChildrenOfMorta/
Children of Morta Twitter: https://twitter.com/ChildrenOfMorta
Dead Mage Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/deadmage
Dead Mage Twitter: https://twitter.com/DeadMageStudio
11 bit studios Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/11bitstudios
11 bit studios Twitter: https://twitter.com/11bitstudios
11 bit studios Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/11bitstudios/
Official Children of Morta Wiki: https://childrenofmorta.gamepedia.com/Children_Of_Morta_Wiki

---

Music by: https://www.youtube.com/user/patrykscelina
